entities.name: malfoy manor
entities.description: The location where Harry and his friends are being held captive. ("Malfoy Manor")

entities.name: deluminator
entities.description: An object that can suck light from lamps. ("the Deluminator had sucked from the lamps in the tent")

entities.name: luna lovegood
entities.description: A person who is a fellow prisoner with Harry and his friends. ("Harry saw Luna, all eyes in her white face")

entities.name: ollivander
entities.description: The wandmaker who is curled up on the floor in the corner. ("the motionless figure of Ollivander the wandmaker")

entities.name: dean thomas
entities.description: A person who is a fellow prisoner with Harry and his friends. ("Craning around, he caught sight of their fellow prisoners: Dean and Griphook")

entities.name: griphook
entities.description: A goblin who is a fellow prisoner with Harry and his friends. ("Griphook the goblin")

entities.name: bellatrix lestrange
entities.description: The person who is shouting at Luna from above. ("From above came Bellatrix’s voice")

entities.name: gringotts
entities.description: A location where Bellatrix has a vault. ("You have been inside my vault at Gringotts!")

relationships.description: Luna is using the Deluminator to suck light from lamps. ("Oh, that’s much easier, thanks, Ron,” said Luna, and she began hacking at their bindings again.")
Bellatrix has a vault at Gringotts. ("You have been inside my vault at Gringotts!")
